report.title: User Information Download 5
report.description: Report containing user and person information for download purposes. Includes filter to include only users with/without allocations and another to only show users who have an allocation made in a given date range. Also an event filter to return users associated with a particular event. This version of the report shows buddying information instead of data access policy agreed information.
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM people p JOIN users u ON u.person_id=p.id AND u.deleted=false JOIN users_websites uw on u.id=uw.user_id AND uw.site_role_id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavAddr ON pavAddr.person_id=u.person_id AND pavAddr.person_attribute_id=#address_attr_id# AND pavAddr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavAddr2 ON pavAddr2.person_id=u.person_id AND pavAddr2.person_attribute_id=#address_attr_line_2_id# AND pavAddr2.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavAddr3 ON pavAddr3.person_id=u.person_id AND pavAddr3.person_attribute_id=#address_attr_line_3_id# AND pavAddr3.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavTown ON pavTown.person_id=u.person_id AND pavTown.person_attribute_id=#town_attr_id# AND pavTown.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavCounty ON pavCounty.person_id=u.person_id AND pavCounty.person_attribute_id=#county_attr_id# AND pavCounty.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavCountry ON pavCountry.person_id=u.person_id AND pavCountry.person_attribute_id=#country_attr_id# AND pavCountry.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavPC ON pavPC.person_id=u.person_id AND pavPC.person_attribute_id=#post_code_attr_id# AND pavPC.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav18 ON pav18.person_id=u.person_id AND pav18.person_attribute_id=#over_18_attr_id# AND pav18.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavMentor ON pavMentor.person_id=u.person_id AND pavMentor.person_attribute_id=#mentor_attr_id# AND pavMentor.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values reqSurvForms ON reqSurvForms.person_id=u.person_id AND reqSurvForms.person_attribute_id=#request_survey_forms_attr_id# AND reqSurvForms.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavBuddyingOptIn ON pavBuddyingOptIn.person_id=u.person_id AND pavBuddyingOptIn.person_attribute_id=#buddying_opt_in_attr_id# AND pavBuddyingOptIn.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pavMTA ON pavMTA.person_id=u.person_id AND pavMTA.person_attribute_id=#mta_attr_id# AND pavMTA.deleted=false
-- Get squares associated with users provided the square creation date is later than the minimum date parameter LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values sqrPav ON sqrPav.person_id=u.person_id AND sqrPav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND sqrPav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations sqr ON sqr.id=sqrPav.int_value AND sqr.location_type_id = #core_square_location_type_id# AND sqr.deleted=false AND ('#ignore_square_dates_before#'='' OR (sqr.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_square_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date))) LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values sqrPavDated ON sqrPavDated.person_id=u.person_id AND sqrPavDated.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND sqrPavDated.deleted=false AND sqrPavDated.int_value=sqr.id
-- Get events associated with user. There is an event parameter, need to be careful here as we still want to show the other events a user might be associated -- with even though we might only be returning users associated with a particular event. LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values eventPav ON eventPav.person_id=p.id AND eventPav.person_attribute_id=#user_event_attr_id# AND eventPav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values eventPav2 ON eventPav2.person_id=p.id AND eventPav2.person_attribute_id=#user_event_attr_id# AND eventPav2.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations event ON event.id=eventPav.int_value AND event.location_type_id = #event_location_type_id# AND event.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users_websites accesscheck on accesscheck.website_id=uw.website_id AND accesscheck.user_id=#auth_user_id# AND accesscheck.site_role_id<3 WHERE p.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (('#allocation_status#'='') OR ('#allocation_status#'='allocated' AND sqrPavDated.id IS NOT NULL) OR ('#allocation_status#'='unallocated' AND p.id NOT in ( select person_id from person_attribute_values subPav join locations subSqr ON subSqr.id=subPav.int_value AND subSqr.location_type_id = #core_square_location_type_id# AND subSqr.deleted=false and ('#ignore_square_dates_before#'='' OR (subSqr.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_square_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date))) where subPav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND subPav.deleted=false AND subPav.person_id=u.person_id ) )) -- Only show users who have a square allocated within a given date range. Users who have a square allocation in the range, but other squares for them are outside the range, have those extra squares shown in red. AND (('#allocation_date_start#'='' AND '#allocation_date_end#'='') OR (p.id in ( select person_id from person_attribute_values pavAllocDated join locations sqrAllocDated ON sqrAllocDated.id=pavAllocDated.int_value AND sqrAllocDated.location_type_id = #core_square_location_type_id# AND sqrAllocDated.deleted=false and ('#ignore_square_dates_before#'='' OR (sqrAllocDated.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_square_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date))) where pavAllocDated.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pavAllocDated.deleted=false AND (pavAllocDated.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#allocation_date_start#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#allocation_date_start#'='') AND (pavAllocDated.created_on <= CAST(COALESCE('#allocation_date_end#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#allocation_date_end#'='') AND pavAllocDated.person_id=u.person_id )))

param.name: event_id
param.description: Select an event to see people signed up up for that event.

param.name: allocation_status
param.description: Choose whether you only wish to return users with allocated squares, without allocated squares, or leave as Please Select for both.

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: user_event_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user events

param.name: registration_date_start
param.display: User registered on or after this date
param.description: Only return users who registered on or after this date.

param.name: registration_date_end
param.description: Only return users who registered before this date.

param.name: ignore_registration_dates_before
param.description: Ignore anyone who registered earlier than this date. Useful if old users are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: address_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds the user address.

param.name: address_attr_line_2_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds the user address line 2.

param.name: address_attr_line_3_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds the user address line 3.

param.name: town_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds the user town.

param.name: county_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds the user county.

param.name: country_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds the user country.

param.name: post_code_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds the user post code.

param.name: over_18_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds whether a user is over 18.

param.name: mentor_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds whether a user is a mentor.

param.name: request_survey_forms_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds whether a user requested the survey forms.

param.name: buddying_opt_in_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds whether a user has opted-in to buddying.

param.name: mta_attr_id
param.description: Person attribute id that holds whether a user is a member of the MTA.

param.name: allocation_date_start
param.display: User allocated square on or after this date
param.description: Only return users who were allocated a square on or after this date.

param.name: allocation_date_end
param.display: User allocated square before this date
param.description: Only return users who were allocated a square before this date.

param.name: user_admin_page_link
param.description: Link to page which administrators use to manage users.

param.name: leitrim_person_id
param.description: Override the county, country, post code of the person with this person ID as they are in Republic Of Ireland which is not normally supported

column.name: email_address
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE p.email_address END

column.name: address
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE trim( split_part( REPLACE(pavAddr.text_value, E'\n', ',' ) ,',',1) ) END

column.name: address_line_2
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE trim( split_part( REPLACE(pavAddr.text_value, E'\n', ',' ) ,',',2) ) END

column.name: address_line_3
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE trim( substring( REPLACE(pavAddr.text_value, E'\n', ',' ), '[^,]*,[^,]*,(.*)' ) ) END

column.name: town
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE pavTown.text_value END

column.name: county
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN p.id = #leitrim_person_id# THEN 'Co. Leitrim' ELSE pavCounty.text_value END END

column.name: country
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN p.id = #leitrim_person_id# THEN 'ROI' ELSE pavCountry.text_value END END

column.name: post_code
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN p.id = #leitrim_person_id# THEN '' ELSE pavPC.text_value END END

column.name: over_18
column.sql: case pav18.text_value when '1' then 'Yes' else 'No' End

column.name: mentor
column.sql: case pavMentor.text_value when '1' then 'Yes' else 'No' End

column.name: request_survey_forms
column.sql: case reqSurvForms.text_value when '1' then 'Yes' else 'No' End

column.name: buddying_opt_in
column.sql: case pavBuddyingOptIn.text_value when '1' then 'Yes' else 'No' End

column.name: mta_member
column.sql: case pavMTA.text_value when '1' then 'Yes' else 'No' End

column.name: allocated_squares
column.sql: string_agg(distinct(case when ((sqrPavDated.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#allocation_date_start#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#allocation_date_start#'='') AND (sqrPavDated.created_on <= CAST(COALESCE('#allocation_date_end#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#allocation_date_end#'='')) Then sqr.name || ' (' || sqrPav.created_on || ')' else '' || sqr.name || ' (' || sqrPav.created_on || ')' || '' END), ', ')
